detaileddescription.para: cache_content_open: opens the local fd on the cache.
Opens the local fd on the cache.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_close: closes the local fd on the cache.
Closes the local fd on the cache.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_content_entry_t *pentry, cache_content_io_direction_t read_or_write, fsal_seek_t *seek_descriptor, fsal_size_t *pio_size_in, fsal_size_t *pio_size_out, caddr_t buffer, fsal_boolean_t *p_fsal_eof, struct stat *pbuffstat, cache_content_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_content_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_content_rdwr

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_rdwr: Reads/Writes through the cache layer.
Reads/Writes through the cache layer. This routine should be called only from the cache_inode layer.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in file content layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] a flag of type cache_content_io_direction_t to tell if a read or write is to be done.
[IN] absolute position (in the FSAL file) where the IO will be done.
[OUT] the size of the io that was successfully made.
[OUT] the 'stat' of entry in the data cache after the operation
write:[IN] read:[OUT] the buffer for the data.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] fsal credentials for the operation. [OUT] returned status.

briefdescription.para: Management of the file content cache: read/write operations.

detaileddescription.para:
Author
deniel
Date
